    CursorWrapper subclass that provides direct access to the DatasetDescriptor object described by the results.

    Callback interface providing notification when the content of the data store has changed.

    Callback interface for changes to the preferred projection.

    Callback interface for changes to the current selection.

    RasterDataStore.DatasetQueryParameters
    Dataset query parameters.
    RasterDataStore.DatasetQueryParameters.GSD
    Orders the results by maximum GSD (resolution).
    RasterDataStore.DatasetQueryParameters.Name
    Orders the results by dataset name.
    RasterDataStore.DatasetQueryParameters.Order
    Defines the ordering to be applied to the results.
    RasterDataStore.DatasetQueryParameters.PointSpatialFilter
    All datasets that contain the specified point will be selected.
    RasterDataStore.DatasetQueryParameters.Provider
    Orders the results by dataset provider.
    RasterDataStore.DatasetQueryParameters.RegionSpatialFilter
    All datasets intersecting the region of interest are accepted.
    RasterDataStore.DatasetQueryParameters.SpatialFilter
    A spatial filter.
    RasterDataStore.DatasetQueryParameters.Type
    Orders the results by dataset type
